item.title: Safeguarding Justice: Advocates Protest Court Relocation in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Eighth Day of Protest: Advocates Stand United for Justice
On the eighth day of the protest, senior advocates Vijay Kumar, Rajasekhar Reddy, Lathipuram Venkatrama Reddy, and Anand Rao participated in the demonstration, voicing their strong opposition to the proposed relocation of the district court in Gadwal.
A Legend Leads the Way: Advocate Banala Krishnamurthy
Eighty-three-year-old senior advocate Banala Krishnamurthy, a living testament to Gadwalâ€™s post-independence legal and politi...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh Veeresh
